project.name: Open Sound Control Server Test
project.description: A Java Activity that sets up a server which responds to Open Sound Control Messages. Try /gong and /chime. This activity only plays sounds if it is activated.

property.name: space.opensoundcontrol.server.port
property.description: The port that the Open Sound Control server will listen on.

property.name: space.opensoundcontrol.methodaddress
property.description: The OSC address that will invoke the OSC method that plays the sounds.

property.name: space.opensoundcontrol.trackmap
property.description: The track map for this example's messages. It maps sound IDs to files to be played when those messages come in. It is of the form soundId1:file1:soundId2:file2:...
